name: Perl Sitemap XML Generator
short_description:
This perl script will crawl your website, and produce a sitemap.xml file, suitable for updating google webmaster tools. It can also be set to crawl your site, and automatically FTP the sitemap.
Useful for content managed websites. A work in progress!
